name: Fleshface
description:
Fleshface is a survival horror  where you must steal 5 skulls from a monster in a medieval manor, then escape. You have no weapons, you  only have your wit and a torch.

Game Features

A disfigured monster that is always on the hunt

Difficulty increased with your progress

A labyrinth of dark stairways, dungeons and occult rooms to get lost in

Hard mode - (randomized skull location, more aggressive AI)

Simple controls - can pick up and learn quickly

Torch has to be lit but the noise will alert the monster of your whereabouts

Cursed Skulls you must collect then escape with

3 hits before you die (normal mode)

Dying resets your progress
